addons.description: Transmission Control Panel supports viewing, adding, removing, starting and stopping torrents.

addons.news:
Version 1.0.0
        * Complete rework of original script.transmission by Correl J.Roush
        * Coded in Python 3
        * Targets Kodi 19.0 "Matrix" and newer
addons.summary: A client for the popular Transmission BitTorrent application
